Text:
Heh, spent like two years of my life on this game lol. I remember it was one of the first to sport mods, binary editing the exes. It was a blast.

I don't think I can stomach playing again though, it's just so archaic by now. Not to mention I have no idea where the mods were (force all kills = drop, highlight loot, etc) and playing the vanilla game would just be depressing.

Thanks for the upload though, this game = good times.
